mosinstall.name: RokFlickr Module
mosinstall.author: Ben Coleman - Andy Miller
mosinstall.description: Module that uses the Flickr Badge script to dispaly flickr images on your Joomla! website

param.name: source
param.label: Source
param.description: Which images shall the module display

param.name: flickrid
param.label: Flickr ID (if source is user or group)
param.description: Flickr user account number, To find it look at the URL for your RSS feed. your user id is the number after '?id=' Or use the following URL which can help you find your ID 'http://eightface.com/code/idgettr/'

param.name: tag
param.label: Tag (if source is tag)
param.description: Tag to use when the source is (Tag)

param.name: count
param.label: Number of images
param.description: The number of images to display

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
